tutorial_course.name: Flight Training Academy
tutorial_course.description: Learn the basics of spaceship flight with guided instructions

segments.name: Basic Movement
instructions: Welcome to Flight Training Academy!
Use W/S to control forward/backward thrust
Try moving forward to the green waypoint
segments.success_criteria: Player reaches waypoint using thrust controls
ui_hints: Press S to decelerate or reverse

segments.name: Lateral Movement
instructions: Great! Now let's learn lateral movement
Use A/D to strafe left/right
Use Q/E to move up/down
Navigate to the waypoint using lateral thrusters
segments.success_criteria: Player uses lateral controls to reach waypoint

segments.name: Rotation Controls
instructions: Excellent! Now let's practice rotation
Move your mouse to control pitch and yaw
Rotate your ship to face the next waypoint
The ship HUD will show your target direction
segments.success_criteria: Player uses mouse to orient and navigate

segments.name: First Ring
instructions: Time to try your first ring!
Rings are checkpoints in flight courses
Align with the ring and fly through it
The ring will turn green when you pass through
ui_hints: Line up with the ring center

segments.name: Speed Control
instructions: Perfect! Let's practice speed control
Hold W to accelerate to maximum speed
Watch your velocity indicator on the HUD
Reach the next waypoint at high speed
segments.success_criteria: Player maintains high speed for 2 seconds

segments.name: Precise Maneuvering
instructions: Great speed control! Now let's practice precision
Hold Shift to enable precision mode (reduced thrust)
Navigate through the narrow ring carefully
segments.success_criteria: Player uses precision mode to pass narrow ring

segments.name: Vertical Navigation
instructions: Excellent control! Time for vertical movement
The next waypoint is high above you
Use Q/E and mouse pitch to climb
Maintain forward velocity while ascending
ui_hints: Mouse up to pitch nose up

segments.name: Descending Turn
instructions: Nice climb! Now let's practice descending
The waypoint is below and to the side
Combine rotation, descent, and lateral movement
This is a 3D maneuver - use all controls together
ui_hints: Q: Descend | A/D: Turn | W: Thrust

segments.name: Flight Assist Modes
instructions: Well done! Let's learn about Flight Assist
Press F to cycle through assist modes:
- AutoLevel: Ship auto-corrects orientation
- Stability: Damping reduces drift
- None: Full manual control
Try each mode and see the difference
ui_hints: Press F to change assist mode

segments.name: Ring Sequence
instructions: Now let's combine everything you've learned
Navigate through 3 rings in sequence
Use the skills you've practiced
Take your time - this is your final test!
segments.success_criteria: Player passes through all 3 final rings

segments.name: Graduation
instructions: Congratulations! You've completed flight training!
You've learned:
- Forward/backward thrust (W/S)
- Lateral movement (A/D, Q/E)
- Rotation controls (Mouse)
- Ring navigation
- Speed control
- Precision maneuvering
- Flight assist modes
You're now ready to tackle real flight courses!
Fly to the finish line to complete training

behavior.auto_advance: Advances to next segment when objectives complete
behavior.repeat_instructions: Press H to repeat current instructions
behavior.pause_game: Tutorial pauses game when showing instructions
behavior.resume_on_dismiss: Game resumes when player dismisses instruction

tutorial_manager.description: Manages tutorial progression, instruction display, and objective tracking

variables.name: TutorialData
variables.description: Tutorial course data with all segments

variables.name: ObjectiveTracker
variables.description: Track completion status of current objectives

functions.name: StartTutorial
functions.description: Initialize tutorial and show first segment
functions.implementation: Create instruction widget, load first segment, pause game, show instructions

functions.name: ShowSegmentInstructions
functions.implementation: Update instruction widget text, show objectives, pause game temporarily

functions.name: CheckObjectiveCompletion
functions.description: Monitor player actions and check objective completion
functions.implementation: Called every tick, checks objective criteria, updates UI, advances when complete

functions.name: AdvanceToNextSegment
functions.implementation: Increment segment index, show new instructions, reset objectives

functions.name: CompleteTutorial
functions.implementation: Give XP/Credits, unlock Easy courses, show completion screen, return to menu

functions.name: SkipTutorial
functions.description: Allow experienced players to skip tutorial
functions.implementation: Confirm skip dialog, unlock Easy courses, return to menu
